englishTranslationText: And	indeed	for	you	is	an	infinite	reward.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	zaroor	tumhāre	liye	be	inteha	sawāb	
hai

englishTranslationText: And	indeed	you	possess	an	exemplary	character.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	be-shak		tumhāri	khu-bu	badi	shān	ki	
hai

englishTranslationText: So	very	soon,	you	will	see	and	they	too	will	realise	-
romanUrduTranslationText: To	ab	koyi	dam	jāta	hai	ke	tum	bhi	dekh	loge	aur	woh	bhi	dekh	leñge

englishTranslationText: That	who	among	you	was	insane.
romanUrduTranslationText: Ke	tum	meiñ	kaun	majnoon	tha.

arabicText: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِمَن ضَلَّ عَن سَبِيلِهِۦ وَهُوَ أَعْلَمُ بِٱلْمُهْتَدِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Indeed	your	Lord	well	knows	those	who	have	strayed	from	His	path,	and	He	well	knows	those	
who	are	upon	guidance.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Be-shak		tumhāra	Rab	khoob	jānta	hai	jo	uski	rāh	se	behke	aur	woh	khoob	jānta	hai	jo	rāh	par	
hai.

englishTranslationText: Therefore	do	not	listen	to	the	deniers.
romanUrduTranslationText: To	jhutlāne	waloñ		ki	bāt	na	sunna

englishTranslationText: They	wish	that	in	some	way	you	may	yield,	so	they	too	might	soften	their	stand.
romanUrduTranslationText: Woh	to	is	āarzu	meiñ	haiñ	ke	kisi	tarah	tum	narmi	karo	to	woh	bhi	naram	pad	jāyeñ

englishTranslationText: Nor	ever	listen	to	any	excessive	oath	maker,	ignoble	person.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	har	aise	ki	bāt	na	sunna	jo	badā	qasameiñ	khāne	wāla	zaleel
